response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the tray with bacon on the stove. Now, we need to turn on the stove to cook the bacon.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge.
(2) Take out the tray with bacon.
(3) Put the tray with bacon on the stove.
(4) Turn on the stove to cook the bacon.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Turn on the stove to cook the bacon.
    stove = registry(env, "stove_rgpphy_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
